content: Do some women spoil male female relations by using their sexuality? “ I might just have to develop other parts of myself to lean into besides my sexuality.” https://medium.com/@courtnee/i-dont-like-being-raped-4fcd0320dd5d When I realized how powerful my young breasts could be, I began to use my sexuality to get other needs met. https://medium.com/@brigittet/the-price-of-disconnection-42e88c5cc1bb “I want to use my sexuality to my advantage” http://therumpus.net/2012/03/the-rumpus-interview-with-milcah-orbacedo/ Will ever overcome the mess created by the types I’ve identified? It seems like you’re attacking a man for being smart.
